Articles.Content:
Yup, it was a very bittersweet moment. I mean, the news are awesome news but... where does that leave my hard-earned VAB-Fu? Am I going to become a relic, or re-learn my old tricks, maybe even create a few new ones? Well, I suppose I could console myself with the MkIII parts I've always asked for (hopefully) and use clever math to distinguish my designs

Rune. Totally not surprised by upgradable buildings, it was obvious.

Hey Rune,

I too was initially concerned that the new editor changes would effect my building.

Having thought about it I don't think it will have any negative effect though. And I'm sure that there will be a compatibility upgrade for EE that simply

adds any features missing after .26.

May the divine help me when they add a cinematic/spectator/replay system to the game...

I heard it happened, but fleetmaster refuses to let me see any screenshots, claiming that 'since you missed it, I'm not showing YOU any of my classified equipment'. (Haha.)

He's referring to a missile. (With the original technology copied from my AIM-9. That's a fact. )

Anyways, I've got AP homework to do.

I remember you saying I was free to use it as long as I gave you credit (Which I even did in the description for the subassembly...)

By the way, if you want to do naval battles....

HMS Queen Elizabeth Class Battleship!

Designer: Zekes

Status: COMPLETED

(KSP, 24.0) This 1170 part, 185 ton battleship is the monster of the Kerbal fleet. With 8 missiles on 4 working turrets and 12 missiles on fixed amidships guns, this ship will rule the seas. It also has a long range "walrus" missile launched just aft of amidships. Press "1" to toggle all the little masts on top, Press "2" to toggle the main engines, and hit "U" to turn on Bridge and search lights. Press "3" several times to toggle the signal lights on the side.

WARNING! Ships of this size have killed computers before (The Fleet Master can vouch for that), so if you do not run KSP with the best settings, DO BE CAREFUL! Also there are no wheels on it, so use the debug menu/ hyperedit to get it to water.

Max Speed: 20 m/s (Don't go over this it tends to break)

Cruising (safe) speed: 10 m/s

Turn just by hitting the left or right turn, it's slow but stable.

Cost: $347,131.30

Download: https://www./?a3858aiacc1ut81

Guess who finally took time time to upload .25 versions of his craft

This Guy

However not all crafts are uploaded and only still need to take pics

Also the manifests need some serious updating so those will come last.

ALSO I STILL NEED A NAME FOR MY BOMBER!!!!

Hey Hatbat, I've got a new, upgraded, Victory class. The problem is that it's now over 500 parts, if you want it then I'll edit my OP.

Also, I'm really looking forward to the next episode.

Hey Hatbat, I've got a new, upgraded, Victory class. The problem is that it's now over 500 parts, if you want it then I'll edit my OP.

Also, I'm really looking forward to the next episode.

Well, good news/bad news. Good news: I've already filmed the Victory and it's a part of the next episode. Bad news: I've already filmed the Victory :/

Well, good news/bad news. Good news: I've already filmed the Victory and it's a part of the next episode. Bad news: I've already filmed the Victory :/

I cant ant wait to see this episode and I can't wait to see the Drek in film!

Okay.

I'm hyped for this episode so much...

I can wait till next season for my ships

Do we have a possible eta on the finale?

I can wait till next season for my ships

Do we have a possible eta on the finale?

I'm working on it, hopefully I'll finish it this weekend. The reason it takes me so long is that I find it hard to get my creative juices flowing in the week-days

Phase 3 initiated.

Phase 3 involves new versions and refinement of every craft. It is like a much more in-depth version of phase 1.

The Broadsword was a test run for this.

Also, is there a download for the Aegis, I'd like to try and dock it with Victory.

Oh and this is extremely

nitpicky but in the series the GMI capital ship was called 'Dreadnaught' if it's named after one of three ships of the Royal Navy (Dreadnought, a race-built galleon that fought the Spanish Armada of 1588, HMS Dreadnought, a 98 gun second rate ship-of-the-line that fought at Trafalgar or HMS Dreadnought, the first all big gun battleship that made all ships before it obsolete) then it's spelt wrong.

P.S. Dreadnought means "Fear nothing" BTW.

I'm working on it, hopefully I'll finish it this weekend. The reason it takes me so long is that I find it hard to get my creative juices flowing in the week-days

Glad to hear it

Also do you have a plain for season two

Like when after season one would you start working on two ?

Also, is there a download for the Aegis, I'd like to try and dock it with Victory.

Oh and this is extremely

nitpicky but in the series the GMI capital ship was called 'Dreadnaught' if it's named after one of three ships of the Royal Navy (Dreadnought, a race-built galleon that fought the Spanish Armada of 1588, HMS Dreadnought, a 98 gun second rate ship-of-the-line that fought at Trafalgar or HMS Dreadnought, the first all big gun battleship that made all ships before it obsolete) then it's spelt wrong.

P.S. Dreadnought means "Fear nothing" BTW.

The download for the Aegis and other ships will be up after the season one finale. Nope, not spelt wrong; it's just what Rune decided to call it. Silly Rune.
Okay, how many parts is it made of?

Also, is there a download for the Aegis, I'd like to try and dock it with Victory.

Oh and this is extremely

nitpicky but in the series the GMI capital ship was called 'Dreadnaught' if it's named after one of three ships of the Royal Navy (Dreadnought, a race-built galleon that fought the Spanish Armada of 1588, HMS Dreadnought, a 98 gun second rate ship-of-the-line that fought at Trafalgar or HMS Dreadnought, the first all big gun battleship that made all ships before it obsolete) then it's spelt wrong.

P.S. Dreadnought means "Fear nothing" BTW.

Yeah, that could just as well have been after the US Navy tug What can I say? I follow american spelling for the sake of dictionary consistency, and because the damn yankees have us all colonized culturally. ^^'

Rune. It'll be nice to have a download of the Aegis that I can load. And I know I was the one that built it.

a

Edited February 2, 2022 by Dtpain
All hail the Corgi Republic. Nice tanks

Two new craft for my companies submissions have been added

First the PGSB-110 Dove

Type: Stealth Bomber

Carries 8 BD armory cluster bombs

Also because it is heavy on take off it features boosters much like the Blue Angels C-130

Second: Omega Class AA guns

Using the Alpha Class tank as its base, the Omega will keep your bases airspace clear using its BD armory 30mm CIWS gun

All I should have to add left is the Dorchester Class

Guess I should start selling Dorchester Class Hype Train tickets

Edited October 18, 2014 by War Eagle 1
